# Validation

This library was generated with [Nx](https://nx.dev).

## Building

Run `nx build validation` to build the library.

## Running unit tests

Run `nx test validation` to execute the unit tests via [Jest](https://jestjs.io).

## Build time generated files

NOTE: The files in /src/lib/schemas and /src/lib/zod are autogenerated. Any manual changes
will be overwritten.

## Generate zod schemas

From workspace root - nx run @contact-tracker/validation:generate-zod
From this folder - nx run validation:generate-zod
